titleStmt.title: Prayers of intercession for their use who mourn in secret, for the publick calamities of this nation. with an anniversary prayer for the 30th of January. Very necessary and useful in private families, as well as in congregations. / By Jo. Huit, D.D.
titleStmt.author: Hewit, John, 1614-1658.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
